pr_title: [GEOT-6389] SLD vendor option graphic-margin can't be empty

timeline.bodyText:
I would go and make sure it's not null, not empty, and not blank, all vendor options are supposed to have some content.
Commons-lang3 is in the classpath here, using SystemUtils.isNotBlank should do the trick.
timeline.author: aaime

timeline.bodyText: Reformats in PRs are not welcomed, please remove all of them.
timeline.author: aaime

timeline.bodyText: Also make sure it's the one you want here (by checking the available keys).
timeline.author: aaime
